DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study determine dietary fat oil influence absorption beneficial plant pigment ( carotenoid ) vegetable . The study examine change blood carotenoid response eat salad different fats/oils .
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Lipids Primary Modulators Carotenoid Absorption Vegetables
DOC.criteria: Age range : 1850 year . Body mass index ( BMI : weight ( kg ) /height ( m2 ) ) range 2029 kg/m² Weight stable ( < 4.5 kg change within last 3 month ) , Constant habitual activity pattern , exceed activity recreational level past 3 month . Must premenopausal Have clinically normal blood profile ( specifically normal liver kidney function fast blood glucose ≤110 mg/dl ) Nonsmoking Nondiabetic No current plan pregnancy Not use hormonebased contraceptive , e.g. , pill , patch , injection , implant , etc . No current use medication affect lipid profile No intestinal disorder include lipid malabsorption , lactose intolerance No heavy consumption alcohol ( > 2 drink per day ) No current use dietary supplement affect cholesterol , ( e.g . Benocol fiber supplement ) willingness discontinue use study . Menopausal Diabetic Currently pregnant Currently use type hormonebased contraceptive , ( e.g. , pill , patch , injection , implant , etc . ) Use lipid altering medication
